DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this work was to describe SBRT different presentations, to study predictive factors for tumor responses following treatment, and to compare tumor response assessments according to the Response Evaluation Criteria
DOC.brief_title: HCC Response Assessment by MRI After SBRT
DOC.criteria: the standard criteria for treating HCC patients with SBRT : an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) score of 2, inoperable tumors (e.g. the patient being unfit for surgery, or tumorrelated contraindications), and a maximum tumor diameter of 6 cm. The HCC diagnosis could be histological or based on the radiological criteria of the American Association for the Study of Liver Diseases (AASLD) no followup by MR imaging
